articles.title: Ashley Judd posts heartbreaking message telling Naomi Judd: 'Be free, my beautiful mother, be free' - Daily Mail
articles.description: Ashley Judd paid tribute Monday to her mother Naomi Judd, who reportedly killed herself a day before she was set to be inducted into the Country Music Hall of Fame.
